key: \c[12]Tony\c[0]
original: \c[12]Tony\c[0]

key: Hello, sir. How can I help you?
original: Hello, sir. How can I help you?

key: Thank you. Please come again.
original: Thank you. Please come again.

key: Me
original: Me

key: Hmm...
original: Hmm...

key: I couldn't find it anywhere. Better ask the shopkeeper.
original: I couldn't find it anywhere. Better ask the shopkeeper.
translation: 我找不到，还是去问问店员吧

key: Hello, I want to buy something like this.
original: Hello, I want to buy something like this.

key: Hi, please wait a moment.
original: Hi, please wait a moment.

key: We're sorry! It seems that we have sold out of this product.
original: We're sorry! It seems that we have sold out of this product.

key: Do you want to buy similar products?
original: Do you want to buy similar products?
translation: 可以给你类似的替代品吗？

key: Doesn't seem okay. I buy this for a friend.
original: Doesn't seem okay. I buy this for a friend.
translation: 应该不行，我替朋友买的

key: Tell me how they are. I can advise you.
original: Tell me how they are. I can advise you.
translation: 给我讲讲，我应该能给你点建议

key: She is my girlfriend.
original: She is my girlfriend.

key: Well. She is a girl and probably count as my friend.
original: Well. She is a girl and probably count as my friend.
translation: 嗯，至少她是女的，也是我朋友

key: So... I guess nothing wrong with it.
original: So... I guess nothing wrong with it.
translation: 所以……差不多就这么回事吧

key: In that case, you can try this.
original: In that case, you can try this.

key: This will bring pleasure to both her and yourself.
original: This will bring pleasure to both her and yourself.
translation: 这个对你对她来说都是好东西

key: What the hell?
original: What the hell?

key: It is sunscreen anyway. It would be fine...
original: It is sunscreen anyway. It would be fine...
translation: 反正也是防晒霜，应该没问题吧

key: I guess...
original: I guess...

key: It looks so familiar...
original: It looks so familiar...

key: Oh! Look like I already bought it.
original: Oh! Look like I already bought it.

key: It will be 2000\i[172].
original: It will be 2000\i[172].

key: Buy
original: Buy

key: No
original: No

key: Do you need anything else?
original: Do you need anything else?

key: I only take this. Thanks!
original: I only take this. Thanks!

key: I will look for another sunscreen oil.
original: I will look for another sunscreen oil.
translation: 我去找找其他防晒霜吧

key: Oh man, 2000\i[172]! I don't have enough money. Better get it next time.
original: Oh man, 2000\i[172]! I don't have enough money. Better get it next time.
translation: 老天，2000\i[272]！我可没带够钱，还是下次再买吧

key: I will find another sunscreen oil.
original: I will find another sunscreen oil.
translation: 我还是去找其它防晒霜吧

key: Thank you very much! Please tell me if you need anything else.
original: Thank you very much! Please tell me if you need anything else.
translation: 非常感谢！还有什么想买的随时找我
